description: Hire an Executive Luxury Car Services in Toronto We here at Elite luxury Car Service are setting the standards for luxury transportation in Toronto and across entire Toronto. Just like a limo service, our luxury cars feature tinted windows for privacy. Once you’ve arrived, book a Black chauffeur service to deliver you within the city without any hassle. Elite luxury car services have been providing luxury and executive car services in the Greater Toronto Area over 10 years. All our courteous, discreet and smartly dressed chauffeurs are there to provide you with exemplary service cater to your needs and get you to your destination on time. We offer convenient, reliable and luxurious Limousine transportation in the Toronto and Toronto regions. Get great deals on luxurious transportation service in Toronto for airport and more. Please contact us today for a quote!

reviews.title: Awesome hotel
text: Stayed here 2 weeks in August and returned in September. Greeted with a big smiles from front desk. M club employees Kaddish, Tyneeka, Andrew and Rosa were awesome. I will return to this hotel in November even though it is not the perfect location to visit my family.
Kudos to the manager for hiring these exceptional staff members.

reviews.title: Unforgettable Holiday travel
text: I went on a ride with Elite Limo to Niagra on the lake winery ride with my family and the chauffeur was polite, punctual and professional, the SUV was neat and comfortable and the price was amazing..... I would recommend this to all my known ones.......I would give them five-star ratings...

reviews.title: Alicante Car Hire - give ‘OK Mobility’ a miss.
text: Used OK Mobility for car hire in Alicante. On returning the car, I was told I had caused damage but it was so insignificant as to be invisible. I always take photos of my hire car at collection. They charged me €460 and have yet to send me any correspondence (they said I would have an email within the hour). This on 19.4.24. I travel regularly to Spain, am aware of this type of scam, but have never had any trouble before this. It’s fraudulent behaviour…Should have read Trust Pilot reviews, says it all.

reviews.title: Great Customer Service!
text: My friend and I were picked up at Toronto International Airport.  Our driver contacted us as soon as we landed, and was waiting for us at the designated spot.  In spite of the crazy traffic, our driver got us to our hotel safely and in a timely manner, and was friendly and helpful throughout the drive.  The same driver picked us up on our return trip!  Great customer service and reasonable rates.  I would book with them again!

reviews.title: Great Company
text: We were picked up from our Hotel and driven to Lake Simcoe. Our driver, Karan was wonderful.  We had an amazing private chauffeur service in a beautiful clean Cadillac Escalade. Several days later we were picked up from the Lake and driven to the airport. The whole experience was reasonably priced  and exceptional. I must mention “GM”  who owns the company and helped make this effortless and enjoyable.
My husband and I , along with our friends, highly recommend this company . Don’t hesitate to use them.

reviews.title: If you're looking for a reliable car service - look no further!
text: Pick-up from Union Station and drop-off in Mississauga. The customer service was excellent! Very communicative, reasonably priced, on time and clean. The driver knew the city/routes and  the administrative staff is exceptional.

reviews.title: Great chauffeur experience
text: We took a recent trip to Niagara from Pearson Int Airport and again from Downtown Toronto back to Pearson. Our driver was called Harsh. He was very smart and professional and also knowledgeable of the area, sharing lots of information on places to visit. His SUV was immaculate and he helped with cases etc, always on time to collect us. We also arranged a trip to the zoo which he helped us out with. Thank you Harsh, you make our Canadian experience all the better.

reviews.title: Airport Chauffeur Service from Barrie to Toronto Pearson
text: Very friendly driver, on time and amazing private chauffeur service from Barrie to Toronto Pearson airport. Highly recommended and use them again.

reviews.title: He would recommend their service for all of your future transportation.
text: I booked their services for my boss and he was very impressed he said that the chauffeur was on time, texted him upon his arrival and helped him load his and a co-workers suitcases into the vehicle. His SUV was super nice and clean, he was well curious experienced and knowledgeable. Definitely going to be booking with them again.

reviews.title: Don't rent from Thristy at Phoenix Sky Harbor Airport
text: We rented a vehicle from Thrifty on February 12th at Sky Harbor and through slight of hand at check-in ended up paying $244,93  plus 15%  tax for lost damage waiver (coverage I personally have on my insurance). I told the attendant that i did not need it. However he charged me anyway and did not show me a sign contract, simply printed a form and put it in a folder. I did not think much about as i assumed that upon return on February 19th that i would be printed off a receipt with all charges shown. When we went to pick up the Nissan Rogue it was full of scratches and dents. We asked the attendant to walk around and do  a write up (it was Super Bowl weekend and there were not many vehicles around). He flippantly told us to takes photos as evidence (very unprofessional). Upon our return on February 19th, the attendant in the garage told us that they don't print out invoice/receipts like they used to but will email the invoice. being trusting and time challenged we didn't think that this was a problem. Upon receiving the invoice by email the next day with the charges, we now see it as a set up. Recommend to all travelers to Phoenix, stay away from Thrifty at the airport.

reviews.title: Reliable, pleasant, with touches of luxury!
text: My colleague and I chose to book a car with Elite GTA to drive us from my home to Pearson Airport because their price was comparable (within $5-$10) to other companies.  The driver was so kind, calling me 10 minutes before pick up to see if we wanted a coffee (it was the morning and he was going to stop to get coffees if we wanted one). The ride was smooth and the driver was very pleasant. We opted to take the 407 to save time and the 407 charge was pretty much that charged by the 407 (no mark-up, or very little by Elite GTA).  We were very satisfied with the service that we booked a ride for our return from the airport. For our return trip with Elite GTA, we were greeted by another driver who, like the first driver, showed up a few minutes early to the airport to pick us up. He texted me the door # that we were to greet him. The SUV was limousine-like, very fancy!! The driver had water, cookies, and mints for us which were pleasantly unexpected! Loved their service- would definitely book again with Elite GTA.

reviews.title: Very pleasant drive
text: Upon arriving in Toronto, we took a limo using Elite GTA Airport Limousine.  Our driver, Gurmit, was pleasant, drove well and was a pleasure to meet.  We would definitely consider using Elite GTA Airport Limo again.

reviews.title: Amazing Experience
text: Me and my family had wonderful experience & I would strongly recommend Elite GTA limousine service. Keep up the Good work! Special thanks to the driver for being so friendly & greatful to my kids.

reviews.title: THE BEST RESTAURANT IN MERLO BY FAR
text: By far the best of Merlo, we went twice, the first time we ordered empanadas as a starter, a luxury, and as a main course, ravioli and a sweet and sour bondiola, both spectacular, and for dessert, hot apple pie with ice cream and chocolate volcano, one of the best desserts that I ate in restaurants. And the second again empanadas, and for the main course green trout and a mushroom risotto, also spectacular, and for dessert we repeated the chocolate volcano. Good wines and at a price. Attention of 10 and the place is a dream. Thank you Gabriela and Pablo, we will return.

reviews.title: Best & Affordable taxi/limo service in toronto
text: We have used them many times for airport trips in toronto and always had a positive experience. Great service, professional driver, always on time, very helpful & great price. Would recommend their quality service to anyone looking to book rides in toronto.

reviews.title: On time, good cars
text: On time for pickup and got me to Pearson at the appointed time. Clean luxury cars. Courteous driver. Only issues was that the driver's credit card reader didnt work and luckily I had enough cash. Also did not provide a printed receipt just a blank one that I filled out at home.

reviews.title: round trip service
text: Driver was anxious about late flight and mentioned the pick up time was  requested for 30 minutes prior to scheduled landingZ This must have been an internal error because their form asked for flight detail with arrival time and as professional airport transportation should be monitoring their clients flights. text we and called no less than 6 times while I was landing/ clearing customs. During my short ride he mentioned another client and that tip should reflect his waiting time, very unprofessional. He became pushy about the tip and mentioned hat the return tip should also be included . Reluctantly I gave him both tips. Return driver was very pleasant and professional but very unpleased when i mentioned there tip had previously been given.  will Never use again.

reviews.title: Great Services by Elite Luxury chauffeur services
text: I need the Toronto Pearson to Kitchener car service to visit my uncle home. I call the Elite luxury Chauffeur Services . And ask for their Toronto Pearson to Kitchener car service. They are quick in responding and give me their reliable and effective services on time. I like the way their drivers deal and interact with me and drive as the way I give the suggestion. Their cars are maintained and are full of luxury; I have no issue regarding the services of their company and the attitude of the drivers. They are trained and licensed and are accessible 24 hours at the good rates.

reviews.title: Late plane no limo
text: Firm admits knowing that plane was late. By time we had cleared customs and picked up cases driver had classed us as no show. Refund refused. Do not use this firm. A taxi is just as comfortable, easily found at airport and half the price.

reviews.title: Exceptional service!
text: I booked this service for travel from North York to Newmarket and back again today and I cannot express enough how kind, courteous, and respectful my driver was. He was early for both pick-ups and was a pleasure to travel with. I would highly recommend this company and will definitely use them again. Thank you!

reviews.title: Excellent Service
text: I hired Elite GTA Airport Limousine/Taxi for transportation to and from the Toronto airport for my daughter who was travelling alone. I spoke with Gurmit and he was very nice on the phone and handled the entire booking for me and assured me that my she would be in safe hands. For the first pick up, Gurmit was there a few minutes early and had my daughter safely at the airport.

The return flight back to Toronto was over an hour late and I was concerned the driver would not be there but this was not the case. I called Gurmit and he told me that he was tracking the flight and he would be patiently waiting with a sign with her name on it so she would see him as soon as she came out. As soon as the plane landed, the driver sent text message to her to let her know he was waiting for her.

Within minutes that my daughter texted me to let me know she was in the car and on her way home, I received a call from Gurmit telling me that my daughter had been picked up and his brother would be driving her home.

This company's customer service went above and beyond what I expected. Also, the car was very nice, clean and comfortable. I highly recommend Elite GTA Airport Limousine/Taxi and I would use them again without hesitation. Thank you Gurmit.

reviews.title: Friendly, smooth and fast ride
text: The driver was on time ( he arrived 10 minutes before requested time). The ride was comfortable and we enjoyed the conversation. Great service.

reviews.title: Highly Recommend
text: This a first class operation which I highly recommend. I was very pleased that this company monitored my flight status and notified me when my connection to Toronto was cancelled. I was four hours late getting to Toronto but Gurmit picked us up without missing a beat. This company has excellent drivers, large vehicles and wonderful customer service. We will use this again.

reviews.title: "Excellent Service!"
text: From the moment you approach the vehicle, the driver introduces himself opens your door and makes you feel at ease.  His service is immaculate and punctual.
I can't say enough about the way he treated my daughter.  He gave her a stuffed animal for her to play with for the long ride.
The conversation was genuine and unforced and after two hours I felt like we were best friends for years.
I will definitely book with Elite GTA again.

reviews.title: DO NOT USE THIS COMPANY!
text: Made a reservation in error for a day in the past - before I found the error they had already charged me for something impossible for them to do unless they had a "time machine".  They falsely claimed they tried to call me to correct the error but I was home all day - no call.  NO NOT USE THIS SERVICE - THEY ARE A RUDE MONEY GUBBY BUNCH!  Plenty of alternatives for car service in Toronto

reviews.title: Business Trip to Torotno:-
text: Business Trip to Torotno ..
I was extremely impressed with there full day black Car Service an Torotno.
The Driver were extremely friendly and very punctual on pick up time.
Exactly as promised Black Suv and professional and courteous driver..
i would highly recommend this Company..

reviews.title: HIGHLY RECOMMENDED
text: Elite saved the day!!!! They were able to get our exec from Toronto Airport to the Buffalo airport so fast that he made a flight we didn't think was possible. Amazing customer service, great at communicating and speedy. Highly recommend!!

reviews.title: Hire full Day Luxury Suv My business Trip Toronto.
text: I was very happy with the Toronto Executive car Service, the booking was very easy.
The driver Parm was very knowledgeable and knew the way around Toronto city I would definitely recommend, thank you to for this luxury experience from Toronto Executive car Service.

reviews.title: No refund till date
text: The trip was booked for June'20 and it was cancelled due to covid, they have not refunded till date.

reviews.title: Hire a  Car with Drive-in Toronto.
text: Private Driver Hire Made it is the Best.

We are a group of two retired couples from England and wished to travel to Toronto, Niagara Falls and Niagara on the lake. We hired Private Driver Hire (GM) as our driver for a couple’s day wine tour throughout the Niagara on the Lake and Niagara Falls. We found GM TripAdvisor and would highly recommend his professional help during our recent trip. He and his team made our trip memorable by taking us in the best places, patiently answering all our questions. The best way to see a new country is with a private driver. I would highly recommend him to people who would prefer to be driven around in comfort.

reviews.title: Elite Five Star service
text: Elite Five Star Service...

I need the Pearson Airport Toronto to Niagara Fall car service to visit my Brother home. I call the Elite  Limo. And ask for their Pearson to Niagara falls car service. They are quick in responding and give me their reliable and effective services on time. I like the way their drivers deal and interact with me and drive as the way i give the suggestion. I have no issue regarding the services of their company and the attitude of the drivers.

reviews.title: Great service
text: The whole service was great.  Our driver was amazing very smartly dressed and gave us a history lesson en route.  Little touches like the water in the car is great especially on a 90 minute drive and although only last week was 20 + degrees.

reviews.title: Wine tasting tour
text: Went on wine tasting tour with Elite Toronto Taxi & Limo. The experience was fantastic & perfect tour! Would definitely book them again for Niagara wine tasting tour. Thanks

reviews.title: An elegant ride
text: This is a superior service that knows how to treat its clients. Prompt, polite careful drivers. Clean, spacious vehicle.
